file.name: upload_api.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    HTTPValidationError:
      properties:
        detail:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationError'
          title: Detail
          type: array
      title: HTTPValidationError
      type: object
    NetworkInfo:
      description: Network Information for upload
      properties:
        module_id:
          description: Module ID that the network information relates to
          title: Module Id
          type: string
        network_info:
          description: Base64 encoded network information
          title: Network Info
          type: string
      required:
      - module_id
      - network_info
      title: NetworkInfo
      type: object
    UploadMessageRequest:
      description: Message Content
      properties:
        message:
          description: Encoded packet from a module to be processed by the Myriota
            cloud, as a hex string
          maxLength: 58
          minLength: 58
          pattern: ^[a-fA-F0-9]+$
          title: Message
          type: string
        timestamp:
          description: Optional timestamp of packet creation time in seconds since
            unix epoch
          exclusiveMaximum: 10000000000.0
          exclusiveMinimum: 0.0
          title: Timestamp
          type: integer
      required:
      - message
      title: UploadMessageRequest
      type: object
    ValidationError:
      properties:
        loc:
          items:
            type: string
          title: Location
          type: array
        msg:
          title: Message
          type: string
        type:
          title: Error Type
          type: string
      required:
      - loc
      - msg
      - type
      title: ValidationError
      type: object
info:
  description: Uploads packets directly to Myriota's cloud
  title: Packet Upload API
  version: 0.1.0
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  /network-info:
    post:
      description: Uploads network information retrieved from a module
      operationId: network_info_upload_network_info_post
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/NetworkInfo'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: Successful Response
        '422':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPValidationError'
          description: Validation Error
      summary: Network Info Upload
      tags:
      - Network Information Upload
  /packets:
    post:
      description: Uploads packets directly to Myriota's cloud
      operationId: packet_upload_packets_post
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UploadMessageRequest'
              maxItems: 100
              title: Messages
              type: array
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {}
          description: Successful Response
        '422':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPValidationError'
          description: Validation Error
      summary: Packet Upload
      tags:
      - Packet Upload

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!int `1000000...` into bool; yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!int `0` into bool
